verbs.description: [ARG1: Protests] [ARGM-TMP: on Monday] [V: continued] [C-ARG1: to grow in San Diego and around the country over the Trump administration ’s policy to separate migrant children from their parents] .
[ARG1: Protests] on Monday continued to [V: grow] [ARGM-LOC: in San Diego and around the country] [ARGM-CAU: over the Trump administration ’s policy to separate migrant children from their parents] .
Protests on Monday continued to grow in San Diego and around the country over the Trump administration ’s policy to [V: separate] [ARG1: migrant children] [ARG2: from their parents] .
